mapper.update: update payment SET imp_uid = #{imp_uid}, success = true, merchant_uid = #{merchant_uid}, pay_method = #{pay_method}, payment_type_cd = #{pay_method}, pg_provider = #{pg_provider}, payment_status = case when #{status} = 'paid' then 'W' when #{status} = 'ready' then 'M' when #{status} = 'cancelled' then 'C' else #{status} end where order_no = #{merchant_uid}
